TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridPageChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。 此类不能被继承。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>单击<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件的页选择元素中的按钮时, 将引发事件。
有关实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>的初始属性值的列表, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>请参见构造函数。
有关处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>事件指定和编写处理程序。 它以10个项目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>的增量显示控件上的页面。
[!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/CS/datagridallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/VB/datagridallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]
[!code-aspx-csharp[PageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageIndexChanged/CS/datagridpageindexchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageIndexChanged/VB/datagridpageindexchangedvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object commandSource, int32 newPageIndex) cil managed
Public Sub New (commandSource As Object, newPageIndex As Integer)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: 用户从 控件的页选择元素选定的页的索引。
Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>类的新实例。
当通过调用此<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>构造函数创建的实例时, 以下属性将初始化为指定值。
|属性|初始值| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|`commandSource` 参数。| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>|`newPageIndex` 参数。|
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>类的新实例。
[!code-csharp[Classic DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandSource As Object
public: property System::Object ^ CommandSource { System::Object ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>使用属性可确定引发事件的命令源。 由于仅在单击<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件的页选择元素中的按钮时引发此事件, 因此返回的源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>是表示页选择元素的对象。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>属性以编程方式控制引发事件的命令源。
[!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/CS/datagridallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/VB/datagridallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewPageIndex As Integer
public: property int NewPageIndex { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取用户在 控件的页选择元素中选定的页的索引。
Docs.value: 用户在 控件的页选择元素中选定的页的索引。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性可确定用户在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件的页选择元素中选择的页的索引。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A> 此值通常用于设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件的属性以显示所选页面。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>属性来确定用户在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件的页选择元素中选定的页的索引。 然后, 此值用于设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件的属性以显示所选页面。
[!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/CS/datagridallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/VB/datagridallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]
